docs.snippet: PASO DE LOS LIBRES, Argentina, May 21 (U.P.) -- Means of ending the eleven-week-old Paraguayan civil war were discussed by Presidents Peron and Dutra in their meeting here today, according to authoritative Argentine sources.

docs.snippet: WILLIAM S. HOWELL Jr.: on May 22, at Bryan, Tex., age 56. Mr. Howell died one-half hour before he was to leave for South America to assume his new post as United States Ambassador to Uruguay. A veteran of the United States diplomatic service, he...
docs.lead_paragraph: WILLIAM S. HOWELL Jr.: on May 22, at Bryan, Tex., age 56. Mr. Howell died one-half hour before he was to leave for South America to assume his new post as United States Ambassador to Uruguay. A veteran of the United States diplomatic service, he served in many posts, including those in London, Paris, Mexico City and Calcutta.

docs.snippet: Week Ended May 23, 1947 The Canadian free dollar edged forward again last week, continuing the recovery in evidence the last fortnight, or since the setback encountered at the end of April, when liquidation, of May 1 maturities and interest checks...
docs.lead_paragraph: Week Ended May 23, 1947 The Canadian free dollar edged forward again last week, continuing the recovery in evidence the last fortnight, or since the setback encountered at the end of April, when liquidation, of May 1 maturities and interest checks and some speculative offerings depressed the rate to the lowest in the last two years.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., May 26 -- Trygve Lie, Secretary General of the United Nations, expressed hope today that the Committee of Inquiry into Palestine, set up at the recent special session of the General Assembly, would "prepare the way for a just and...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., May 26 -- Trygve Lie, Secretary General of the United Nations, expressed hope today that the Committee of Inquiry into Palestine, set up at the recent special session of the General Assembly, would "prepare the way for a just and workable solution for all."
